title: November 2, 2010
content:
Health Updates: cell phones & brain tumors; almonds, anti-viral; peanuts, allergies; whole grains vs heart disease;... <!--more--> protests against genetic engineering, GE crops in India.
S.
510- the dangers of the ‘Food Safety Bill’ now up for vote in the Senate Dr Garry Gordon: “Father of Chelation Therapy”, internationally recognized as one of the world’s most successful experts on the use of chelation; co-founder of the American College for Advancement in Medicine, former founding president of the International College of Advanced Longevity & a board member of the Scientific Advisory Committee for the National Foundation for Alternative Medicine.
He hosts the online Forum on Anti-Aging and Chelation Therapies for over 1000 alternative medical practitioners to exchange knowledge.
His books include: “The Chelation Answer”, & “Detox with Oral Chelation: Protecting Yourself from Lead, Mercury and Other Environmental Toxins” The recent FDA attack on chelation therapy.
www.gordonresearch.com www.longevityplus.com
